title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A flavorful curry made with tender chicken pieces, aromatic spices, and coconut milk.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a mix of fresh vegetables and savory sauce.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: A rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A classic salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
